data.name: Beach Island Deluxe
data.detailed_description:
Explore the mysterious Beach Island! Face the many challenges the island holds to collect the many stars needed to open up the mysterious portal. Feel free to take it at your own pace, go as fast as you like or kick back and enjoy the beach!

Features


  • Retro Open World Adventure! A completely open and non-linear experience in a charming retro 90’s style for beginners and experienced players.
  • Explore and gather all 15 stars in any way and any order you like! There is no wrong way to play!
  • Three additional stars to find! There’s new things to discover!
  • Speedrun Mode offers exactly the same experience but you’ll be timed! While this game might be short, you’ll spend hours perfecting your speedrun!
  • Full gamepad support! With dynamic control support, you can change from gamepad to mouse and keyboard on the fly!

About Development


This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

data.short_description: Beach Island is a micro open-world platforming game set on the mysterious Beach Island. Scour the island for stars to open up the ancient gateway portal! There's plenty to explore and uncover on Beach Island, can you find all 12 stars?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
